alert.note: Alert for Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:01PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Stillwater, north central Carbon and southwestern Yellowstone Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 300 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just north of Joliet, or 18 miles east of Columbus, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Joliet, Edgar, Park City, Rockvale and Silesia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone
